article:
'Karachi Development Authority' ('KDA') was established to develop Karachi under
master plans. KDA was established in 1957. KDA owns undeveloped land in the city
which it sell to real state development companies in Karachi.

Karachi Development Authority replaced Karachi Improvement Trust (KIT) that was
disbanded by President Muhammad Ayub
Khan [http://www.thenews.com.pk/daily_detail.asp?id=204319 A story behind
every name] in 1957.

The Karachi Development Authority was established by the order No V of 1957
signed by President of Pakistan General Muhammad Ayub Khan (Hilal-e-Ahmar) for
development of the Karachi City and rehabilitation of the Refugees as well as
Riot Affectees.

The Karachi Development Authority was successor of Karachi Improvement Trust and
launched its first scheme at the junction of National Stadium & Karsaz in front
of Agha Khan Hospital, Liaquat National Hospital & Liaquat Memorial Library
known as Dhoraji Colony KDA Scheme 1-A. In the very this authority played a
major role in destroying the city by supporting and backing land grabbers
groups. Even though Pakistan as a whole got a fame in corruption during the
current regime of Asif Ali Zardari, KDA particularly played a leading role in
leaving the city nonsense structure.

After improvement & development of its Scheme 1-A, the president has allowed
him to launched town expansion scheme and The Karachi Development Authority
has launched its first town expansion scheme known as Korangi Township, then
Malir Town, Drigh Township, Malir Extension Township, Drigh Township, North
Karachi Township, Old Nazimabad, North Nazimabad, Orangi Township, Baldia
Township, Lyari Town, Hawksbay, Shah Latif, Mehran Town, Halkani Town, Landhi
Industrial Area, Landhi Residential Scheme, Metroville-I to III, Gulzar-e-
Hijri, Gulshan-e-Iqbal, Gulistan-e-Jauhar, Taiser Town, Korangi Industrial
Area, SITE Metroville etc.

The Karachi Development Authority has also established Karachi Greater water
channel scheme, Malir River Flood Protection Bund etc.

The Karachi Development Authority also approved the master plan for private
housing societies in the territorial limit of Karachi City.

The Karachi Development Authority is also constructed the connecting road of
town ships and main roads of Karachi City, such as MA Jinnah Road, University
Road, Jail Road, Shahrah-e-Faisal, Shahrah-e-Noor Jehan, Shahrah-e-Orangi,
Korangi Road etc.

The Karachi Development Authority also constructed the bridge over the Main road
such as Jam Sadiq Ali Bridge, Super Highway Bridge near Karimabad, Nipa
Chowrangi Flyover etc.
